parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add the units to the custom channel.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> customChannelID [[radioChannelAdd]] units

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> customChannelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]] returned by [[radioChannelCreate]] command

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> units: [[Array]] - list of units

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>2 [[radioChannelAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], unit1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[radioChannelCreate]], [[radioChannelRemove]], [[radioChannelSetCallSign]], [[radioChannelSetLabel]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
